description.narrative: The project aims at promoting critical global citizenship through education training and information to convince of the need to tune the western helping approach on development to be more based on hearing planning and implementation of equal participants to make all development to be sustainable.The project time is used to enabling the direct contact between the Raudaskoski primary school together with the AIDS orphanage and school in the Mufindi area and Ylivieska and Raudaskyla upper secondary schools w ith Iringa International School and ona local A-level school. The contact persons are Leena Pasanen and dr Hillary Duchy.The global education for children and youth is planned and implemented jointly together with the teaching staffs of schools. Themes of this education are mainstreamed to various subjects like religion art biology geography etc.Active information will take up relevant global issues for discussion and present human stories of people from developing countries.
